trustfund:
TF092853-INCLUDING CLIMATE CHANGE
            IMPACTS, ADAPTATION AND VULNERABILITY (CCIAV)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Road Transport Project's
            ultimate development objective is to stimulate higher
            economic growth by increasing effectiveness in the use of
            the federal road infrastructure. The objective is to be
            achieved through: support to the first phase of the federal
            road maintenance and rehabilitation program, and a
            comprehensive program of institutional strengthening
            activities to improve efficiency and sustainability of road
            transport investment programs. The changes consist of: a)
            two minor alterations to clarify the type of interventions
            under the investment component and widen the scope of one
            subcomponent of the technical assistance component, b) a
            reallocation and a partial cancellation of the loan
            proceeds, and c) an 11-month extension of the closing date
            of the loan (a second extension, for a cumulative total
            extension of 23 months) to May 31, 2012 from the current
            closing date June 30, 2011.
